CsvInfoModal.identifierInfo: Chilichonse chothandiza kukuzindikirani, monga ID ya wophunzira kapena adiresi ya imelo. Zilembo zisapitirire 64
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssigned: Makalasi omwe akaunti ya munthu idzapatsidwe chilolezo chokhala kochi
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL1: Musagwiritse ntchito pa akaunti ya ophunzira
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL2: Mndandanda wa mayina a makalas,i yolekanitsidwa ndi mikodolero
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL3: Ngati palibe kalasi yokhala ndi dzinali, kalasi yatsopano yokhala ndi dzina lomwe lili mu fayilo ya CSV ipangidwa
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolled: Makalasi olembetsera akaunti kuti ikhale ya wophunzira
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL1: Ikhoza kukhala mtundu uliwonse wa akaunti
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL2: Lembani mayina a makalasi ndipo muwalekanitse ndi mikodolero
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL3: Ngati palibe kalasi yokhala kale ndi dzinali, kalasi yatsopano yokhala ndi dzina limeneli ipangidwa
CsvInfoModal.passwordInfo: Zilembo zisapitirire 125. Ngati mukufuna kuti isasinthe, gwiritsani ntchito chizindikiro cha kanyenyezi (*) :
CsvInfoModal.sectionDescription: "Spreadsheet" ya CSV  igwiritse ntchito mzere woyamba ngati heda, ndipo ikhale ndi mizere yotsatirayi:
CsvInfoModal.usernameInfo: Zilembo zisapitirire 125. Zikhoza kukhala zilembo za mu afabeti, manambala, kapena zizindikiro izi (_)
CsvInfoModal.uuidInfo: Dzina lomwe Kolibri ingagwiritse ntchito pozindikira akaunti. Musalembepo kalikonse kuti mutsekule akaunti yatsopano
DataPage.detailsInfo: Munthu wogwiritsa ntchito akatsekula chipangizo, nthawi yomwe wakhalapo komanso zomwe waphunzira zimasungidwa. Nthawi iliyonse imene wogwiritsa ntchito watsekula chipangizo imasungidwa ndipo izi zikuphatikizanso kagwiritsidwe ntchito kosadziwika mwini kumene kwachitika popanda munthu wina kulowa pa Kolibri.
DataPage.detailsSubHeading: Ulendo uliwonse umene munthu waona zinthu
DataPage.noLogsYet: Palibe ma logi oti mungapange dawunilodi.
DataPage.pageSubHeading: Tengani ma fayilo ogwiritsa ntchito nkodolero polekanitsa ma uthenga (CSV) momwe muli uthenga wokhudza anthu ogwiritsa ntchito ndi zomwe apanga ndi zipangizo
DataPage.summaryInfo: Munthu akhoza kuona zinthu zimodzimodzi nthawi zingapo. Failo ino imasunga nthawi yonse imene munthu waona zinthu komanso mmene munthuyo akuchitira ndiponso zimene wakwanitsa kuchita. Timachita zimenezi mwina potengera maulendo amene munthuyo waona zinthuzo. Sitisunga zimene munthu waonaasanalowe pa pulofailo.
DataPage.summarySubHeading: Nthawi zonse pamodzi/mmene chinthu chilichonse chikuyendera
EditFacilityNameModal.renameFacilityExpl: Chenjezo: Dzina la malo lokha ndi lomwe lisinthe, ndipo dzina latsopano ligwirizanitsidwa komanso kusinthidwa mu zipangizo zina zolumikizana ndi malowa.

FacilityConfigPage.documentTitle: Kukonza Zina ndi Zina Zokhudza Malo

FacilityConfigPage.learnerCanEditUsernam: Lolani ophunzira kusintha dzina lawo lolowera
FacilityConfigPage.saveFailure: Zinazake zalakwika pobweretsa ma seting'i anu
FacilityConfigPage.showDownloadButtonInL: Onetsani batani la 'dawunilodi' ndi zimene mukufuna kupanga kutenga
FacilityIndex.adminOrSuperuser: Muyenera kulowa pa akaunti ngati adimini kapena supa adimini kuti muthe kuona za patsamba lino
IdentifierTextbox.label: Chozindikiritsa (Si zokakamiza)
ImportInterface.editCSV: Sinthani zinthu zokhudza akaunti pogwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu ina ya "spreadsheet"
ImportInterface.exportCSV: Tumizani fayilo ya CSV yokhala ndi ma akaunti onse komanso makalasi omwe akugwirizana nayo
ImportInterface.generateCSV: Kupanga failo ya CSV ya munthu
ImportInterface.importCSV: Lowetsani fayilo ya CSV kuti mutsekule kapena kukonzanso ma akaunti
ImportInterface.sectionDescription: Mukhoza kusintha, kulowetsa kapena kutumiza ma akaunti ndi makalasi ambirimbiri nthawi imodzi
Init.beforeCommitting: Musanalowetse, muonetsedwa mwachidule zinthu zomwe zisinthidwe
Init.caution: CHENJEZO: Kulowetsa zinthu kuchokera ku CSV kuchititsa kuti zinthu zambiri zokhudza ma akaunti ndiponso makalasi zisinthe, ndipo kubwezeretsa kwake ndi kovuta.
Init.importL2: sinthani ma akaunti omwe alipo kale (pa ma akaunti omwe akufanana maina)
Init.importL3: Konzani makalasi amene wophunzira aliyense alowemo
Init.importL4: Konzani makalasi amene kochi aliyense apatsidwe
Init.importL5: Tsekulani makalasi atsopano (okhudza makalasi omwe mayina ake palibe)
Init.importingWill: Kulowetsa kuchokera ku CSV kuchititsa kuti:
Init.introduction: Mukamalowetsa kuchokera ku "spreadsheet" mukhoza kutsekula, kusintha kapena kusankha kuti muchotse ma akaunti ambirimbiri nthawi imodzi polowetsa uthenga watsopano kuchokera ku mafayilo yolekanitsidwa ndi mkodolero (CSV).
Init.labelDelete: Muchotsenso ma akaunti ndi makalasi omwe sakupezeka mu CSV
Init.optionally: Mukhoza kusankha kuchotsa ma akaunti ndi makalasi omwe sakuoneka mu "spreadsheet".
Init.proceed: Kuti mupitirize, sankhani fayilo ya CSV:

Preview.someRowErrors: Mizerei iyi ili ndi zolakwika ndipo idumphidwa ngati mupitirize:
Preview.summary: Mfundo zachidule zosonyeza zinthu zimene mwasintha ngati mungasankhe kulowetsa:
PrivacyModal.privacyText: Nzotheka kuti oyang'anira Kolibri asakanize zopezeka pa Kolibri ndi madera ena a ntchito za Kolibri. Zikatere, zonse zopezeka pa Kolibri zizionedwa ndi oyendetsa ntchito za magawo enawo a Kolibri. Zinthuzo zidzayikidwa mmagawo oyendetsedwa ndi a Learning Equality omwe angathenso kuona zonsezi.
SyncInterface.learnMore: Kagwiritsidwe ntchito komanso zokhudza kusunga chinsinsi

UserEditPage.viewInDeviceTabPrompt: Onani zambiri mu mapelemishoni a chipangizochi
